title: Numerous random little d/c's during games since patch
body:
Hi there,

Since this last patch I've been getting these 5-10 second d/c's in game about 15-20 times a game - long enough that i will probably end up dying most of the time it happens.

I'm not losing an internet connection, and nothing else on my PC/consoles/phones reflect this 5-10 second disconnect, its only happening in this game.

Any idea what is possibly going on and how it can be fixed?

Cheers,

replies.body:
Hello again guys,

I know you all have probably spent the last 5 days thoroughly investigating my issue - but i was just wondering if you would have an update on your progress to finding a solution for me as I'm still having the issue and is currently very unplayable.

Cheers
